# Server Rules
The 3 prime directives of the server: - Remember to give everyone the benefit of the doubt. - Remember to treat everyone with respect, and consider how what you say and when you say it might effect the perception of what you say. - If you don't report issues you have to w4sted before they become a major problem, you are part of the problem.
1 - Dont Be A Dick. 
 2 - Do Not grief Arrivals 
 3 - Do not Attack Evac unless it is your objective as an ANTAG 
 4 - No Combat at CentComm Station, else risk a ban! 
 
 W4sted Has The Final Say.
